GetRecommendation.name: GetRecommendation
GetRecommendation.description: Grants permission to get resource configuration and estimated cost impact for a recommendation

ListEnrollmentStatuses.name: ListEnrollmentStatuses
ListEnrollmentStatuses.description: Grants permission to list enrollment statuses for the specified account or all members under a management account

ListRecommendationSummaries.name: ListRecommendationSummaries
ListRecommendationSummaries.description: Grants permission to list recommendation summaries by group

ListRecommendations.name: ListRecommendations
ListRecommendations.description: Grants permission to list summary view of recommendations

UpdateEnrollmentStatus.name: UpdateEnrollmentStatus
UpdateEnrollmentStatus.description: Grants permission to update the enrollment status
